title: World Cup
description: Your hub for Freestyle Canada World Cup details and information.

tremblant_info.sub_header: 2022 Mackenzie Investments Freestyle FIS Moguls World Cup Presented by Toyota
tremblant_info.text: Join us for one of the most exciting events on Canadian soil this winter! We will be welcoming the world’s best freestyle moguls skiers to compete in back-to-back FIS World Cup moguls competitions in Mont Tremblant, Québec. Over 100 athletes from 15 different countries will challenge Team Canada in men’s and women’s single moguls.

winsport_info.sub_header: 2022 FIS Freeski Halfpipe World Cup Presented by Toyota
winsport_info.text: The Snow Rodeo FIS Freeski Halfpipe World Cup, presented by Toyota, is back for it’s third instalment at Calgary’s Canadian Olympic Park! Join us as hundreds of the world’s top athletes hit the hill and compete in the stunt ditch.
